posts.post_content:
I'd like to pick up some HOF rare backs to add to my collection. does not have to be high-grade, but i do prefer that they are graded, SGC or PSA. 

PS- I am also looking specifically for my old T206 McGraw (w/ cap) Lenox (PSA 1.5) that i had about a year ago. I forget who bought it from me, but i would be interested in acquiring it back.

Please shoot me a PM. Thanks!

Wish I still had it, buddy.  I hope some one chimes in here and unloads it to you.  great card for sure!

Jimi

Thanks Jimi!

Actively seeking rare backs. Shoot me a PM.
